name: AccentGo
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: accent go
des:
Have you ever wondered how to pronounce a word in different accents? Accent Go! is here to help you learn how to pronounce words in different accents.

Enable this skill to get a suggested "Word of the Moment" and hear how to pronounce it in American and British English. Each time you open the skill, you will get a different Word of the Moment so that you can continue to learn distinctive ways of pronouncing different words.

Want to know the meaning of the word too? Accent Go! will also give you the meaning of the Word of the Moment to help you learn the meanings of different words while learning accents.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
